item.title: [HIVE-18675] make HIVE_LOCKS.HL_TXNID NOT NULL
item.description: In Hive 3.0 all statements that may need locks run in a transaction

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
